snippet: First baseman Eric Hosmer invited Royals fans to a local pub after leading the team to a sweep of the Angels.
abstract: Kansas City Royals' first baseman Eric Hosmer, who missed most of August with a hand injury, has had a batting average of .500 through four playoff games, all Royals victories; after leading surging team to a sweep of Los Angeles Angels, Hosmer invited Royals fans via Twitter to celebrate with him at a downtown bar, where he helped pay for an open bar for an hour, even spraying some champagne into the crowd.
lead_paragraph: First baseman Eric Hosmer invited Royals fans to a local pub after leading the team to a sweep of the Angels.

headline.main: Eric Hosmer and Teammates Extend Happy Hour After the Royals’ Sweep
headline.print_headline: Hosmer and Teammates Extend Happy Hour After the Royals’ Sweep
